title: Drafting Symbols
content:
Of course, I could be completely off base with this.... but I believe these symbols are (or were) part of a "symbol font". I'm almost positive these were NOT hand drawn. Do these look familiar to anyone? Thanks in advance for your assistance.

Font: 

 DF Organics Plain LET 

Solved By: 

 [DPape](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317212757/http:/typophile.com/user/3945 "View user profile.")

comments.content: Dick - how in the world did you find those? Nicely done.
Yes, very nicely done... thanks so much!
